author: arnetheduck
content: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-metrics/blob/master/metrics.md - how recent is this? has anyone gone through the metrics recently and made sure they still make sense?

author: ajsutton
content: I think it's pretty outdated.  Teku supports most of them but particularly the root metrics seem weird.

author: ajsutton
content: But `beacon_slot`, `beacon_head_slot` and the finalized and justified epochs are extremely useful.  previous live vs active validators is also very useful.  I don't think I've paid any real attention to anything else (though reorgs might have been interesting during non-finalization had I thought to look)
